name: Flying Ferret
description:
What is Flying Ferret?

In this action game, a mysterious ferret with special jumping ability and its friends are made to jump and fly at high speed from island to island over the blue ocean to fly farther and farther.

Story

There was a mysterious group of animals living on a certain sea.
They had incredible jumping ability and lived by flying over the island.
They did not have this jumping ability when they were children, but it came as they grew older.
Therefore, they all had trouble controlling it at first, but with practice they learned to jump well.
There seems to be one ferret here who is practicing hard with his friends.

How to play

The mysterious animals that live on this island can jump amazingly high and far.
Hold down the jump button to make them jump higher.
When the altitude starts to drop, hit the jump button repeatedly and the ferrets will try their best to go farther.
The ferret will try its best to go far away from the island.
If you jump at the moment of landing, you will get a combo and jump at a higher speed.
Keep jumping to reach beyond the horizon!
If you fall into the sea, the game is over! One wrong decision can be fatal. You need to make a quick and accurate decision on which island to use as a foothold.
